00045 namespace wave {
00046   namespace detail {
00047     template<typename T>
00048     std::ostream& writeT(std::ostream& os, const T& data) {
00049       return os.write((char *)(&data), sizeof(T));
00050     }
00051 //     void write_real_sample(std::ostream& os, boost::uint16_t bitsPerSample, double s) {
00052 //       // we assume abs(s)<=1
00053 //       boost::uint32_t si= boost::uint32_t(std::abs(s) * (1L << (bitsPerSample-1)));
00054 //       if (s < 0.) si= 1L + (0xFFFFFFFFL ^ si);
00055 //       for (size_t u(0); u<bitsPerSample; u+=8) {
00056 //         const boost::uint8_t c((si >> u) & 0xFF);
00057 //         writeT(os, c);
00058 //       }
00059 //     }
00060     // for performance reasons this version is avoiding streams
00061     std::string::iterator write_real_sample(std::string::iterator i, boost::uint16_t bitsPerSample, double s) {
00062       // we assume abs(s)<1
00063       boost::uint32_t si= boost::uint32_t(std::abs(s) * (1L << (bitsPerSample-1)));
00064       if (s < 0.) si= 1L + (0xFFFFFFFFL ^ si);
00065       for (size_t u(0); u<bitsPerSample; u+=8) {
00066         const boost::uint8_t c((si >> u) & 0xFF);
00067         *i++ = c;
00068       }
00069       return i;
00070     }
00071 
00072     class wave_header {
00073     public:
00074       wave_header(boost::uint32_t sampleRate,
00075                   boost::uint16_t bitsPerSample,
00076                   boost::uint16_t numChannels)
00077         : format_(sampleRate,
00078                   bitsPerSample,
00079                   numChannels) {}
00080 
00081       wave_header& change_sample_rate(boost::uint32_t new_sample_rate) {
00082         format_.changeSampleRate(new_sample_rate);
00083         data_.size() = 0;
00084         return *this;
00085       }
00086       wave_header& add_samples(size_t number_of_samples) {
00087         data_.size() +=  number_of_samples * format_.numChannels() * format_.bitsPerSample()/8;
00088         riff_.size() =  4 + (8 + format_.size()) + (8 + data_.size());
00089         return *this;
00090       }
00091 
00092       const chunk::riff&   riff()   const { return riff_; }
00093       const chunk::format& format() const { return format_; }
00094       const chunk::data&   data()   const { return data_; }
00095     private:
00096       chunk::riff   riff_;
00097       chunk::format format_;
00098       chunk::data   data_;
00099     } ;
00100   } // namespace detail
00101 
00103   class writer_iq : public processor::base_iq, public gen_filename {
00104   public:
00105     typedef boost::shared_ptr<writer_iq> sptr;
00106 
00107     writer_iq(const boost::property_tree::ptree& config)
00108       : base_iq(config)
00109       , base_path_(config.get<std::string>("<xmlattr>.filePath"))
00110       , file_period_(gen_filename::str2period(config.get<std::string>("<xmlattr>.filePeriod")))
00111       , pos_(0)
00112       , header_(0, config.get<int>("<xmlattr>.bitsPerSample", 16), 2) 
00113         // set correct sampling frequency later, number of channels is fixed to 2
00114     {
00115       std::cout << "writer_iq" << std::endl;
00116     }
00117 
00118     virtual ~writer_iq() {}
00119     
00120     // gen_filename methods
00121     virtual file_period filePeriod()    const { return file_period_; }
00122     virtual std::string fileExtension() const { return "wav"; }
00123 
00124     virtual void process_iq(service::sptr service,
00125                             const_iterator i0, 
00126                             const_iterator i1) {
00127       std::cout << "writer_iq::process_iq " << service->approx_ptime() << " "
00128                 << pos_ << " " 
00129                 << std::distance(i0, i1) << std::endl;
00130       const boost::filesystem::path
00131         filepath(gen_file_path(base_path_, service->stream_name(), service->approx_ptime()));
00132 
00133       if (boost::filesystem::exists(filepath) and (pos_ == std::streampos(0))) {
00134         std::cerr << "file '" << filepath << "' exists and will be overwritten" << std::endl;
00135         boost::filesystem::remove(filepath);
00136       }
00137       if (not boost::filesystem::exists(filepath)) {
00138         std::cerr << "new file " << filepath << " samplerate= " 
00139                   << service->sample_rate_Hz() << std::endl;
00140         std::ofstream ofs(filepath.c_str(), std::ios::binary);        
00141         detail::writeT(ofs, header_.change_sample_rate(service->sample_rate_Hz()));
00142         pos_ = ofs.tellp();
00143         std::cerr << "writing header to file '" << filepath << "' exists " << std::endl;
00144       }
00145       // write data
00146       std::ofstream ofs(filepath.c_str(), std::ios::in | std::ios::out | std::ios::binary);
00147       ofs.seekp(pos_);
00148       std::string s(2*std::distance(i0,i1)*header_.format().bitsPerSample()/8, 0);
00149       std::string::iterator si(s.begin());
00150       for (processor::base_iq::const_iterator i(i0); i!=i1; ++i) {
00151         si = detail::write_real_sample(si, header_.format().bitsPerSample(), i->real()); // i
00152         si = detail::write_real_sample(si, header_.format().bitsPerSample(), i->imag()); // q
00153       }
00154       ofs << s;
00155       pos_ = ofs.tellp();      
00156       detail::writeT(ofs.seekp(0), header_.add_samples(std::distance(i0, i1)));
00157     }
00158 
00159   protected:
00160   private:
00161     std::string    base_path_;
00162     gen_filename::file_period file_period_;
00163     std::streampos pos_;    
00164     detail::wave_header header_;
00165   } ;
00166 } // namespace wave
